Cryptoparty Washington, D.C.

About Us Events

Who We Are

Cryptoparty DC is a local edition of the global movement of the same name. Through Code for DC, this is a community-driven, community-owned learning group. We do not make money. We do not endorse products. We prefer the F/OSS solution, when it makes sense, over the commercially available. To attend, simply RSVP to Code for DC on Meetup. All participants are expected to uphold our Code of Conduct.

Cryptoparty

Inspired by the global Cryptoparty movement, we believe privacy is a fundamental human right. Privacy is a socially constructed concept that varies between users. We will focus on the tools of digital security and leave attendees to define their own practices.

Code for DC

Cryptoparty is a learning group part of Code for DC. We invite all, regardless of technical background, who are interested in learning about and practicing strong digital security.

Empower

Each of our learning groups is led by a member of our community. Topics are selected based on community interest in topics and are intended to serve both the beginner and veteran cryptographer.
